15 Penerbangan Sriwijaya Dibatalkan, Penumpang Dialihkan ke NAM Air
07 Nov 2019, 10:52 by Trio Hamdani


Foto: Reno Hastukrisnapati Widarto

Jakarta - Pengelola Bandara Soekarno-Hatta (Soetta), PT Angkasa Pura II mencatat 15 penerbangan Sriwijaya Air batal terbang. Penumpang pun diberikan dua pilihan, yaitu pengembalian dana pembelian tiket atau dialihkan ke penerbangan NAM Air.Senior Manager of Branch Communication & Legal Bandara Soetta Angkasa Pura II, Febri Toga Simatupang menjelaskan pilihan dikembalikan ke calon penumpang."Sebagian dialihkan ke flight NAM Air. Jadi sebagian sudah dialihkan, sebagian juga sudah refund. Jadi tergantung penumpangnya, dia mau balik ke rumah nggak jadi (terbang), dibatalkan atau dia mau dialihkan ke NAM Air," katanya saat dihubungi detikcom, Jakarta, Kamis (7/11/2019).Pihaknya pun belum mengetahui secara pasti penyebab batalnya sejumlah penerbangan Sriwijaya Air. Namun saat ini proses di lapangan tengah ditangani."Saat ini prosesnya masih proses ditangani oleh petugas Sriwijaya dan NAM Air dan kami juga ikut bantu proses refund tersebut di terminal B1 dan B2," sebutnya.Selain batalnya 15 penerbangan, 3 penerbangan yang dijadwalkan Sriwijaya Air mengalami delay, yaitu tujuan Pangkal Pinang, Pontianak dan dan Yogyakarta. Namun pihak maskapai sudah memberi perlakuan selayaknya."Dan tambahan lagi bahwa teman-teman petugas Sriwijaya sudah memenuhi ketentuan seperti sudah memberi makanan dan refund sesuai ketentuan yang berlaku," tambahnya.Simak Video "Ratusan Penumpang Sriwijaya Air Telantar di Bandara Hasanuddin"[Gambas:Video 20detik](toy/eds)

15 Sriwijaya Flights Canceled, Passengers Diverted to NAM Air
Nov 7 2019, 10:52 AM by Trio Hamdani


Photo: Reno Hastukrisnapati Widarto

Jakarta - Soekarno-Hatta (Soetta) Airport Manager, PT Angkasa Pura II recorded 15 Sriwijaya Air flights canceled. Passengers are also given two choices, namely refunding the purchase of tickets or diverted to NAM Air flights. Senior Manager of the Branch of Communication & Legal Soetta Angkasa Pura II Airport, Febri Toga Simatupang explained the choice was returned to prospective passengers. "Some were transferred to NAM Air flights. So some have been transferred, some have also been refunded. So depending on the passengers, he wants to return to the house so it doesn't (fly), is canceled or he wants to be transferred to NAM Air, "he said when contacted by AFP, Jakarta, Thursday (11/07/2019). It also does not yet know for certain the cause of the cancellation of a number of Sriwijaya Air flights. But currently the process is being handled in the field. "Currently the process is still being handled by Sriwijaya and NAM Air officers and we also assisted the refund process at terminals B1 and B2," he said. In addition to the cancellation of 15 flights, 3 flights scheduled by Sriwijaya Air experiencing delays, namely the destination of Pangkal Pinang, Pontianak and and Yogyakarta. But the airline has given the proper treatment. "And additionally that the friends of Sriwijaya officers have fulfilled the provisions such as already providing food and refunds according to applicable regulations," he added.
